AD_SteelWatcherSword.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_PortraitOfGortash.synopsis: Portrait of Gortash at Entry Gate

AD_SteelWatcherLegUnit.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_BrokenWatcherReturnTo.synopsis: steel watch foundry location hint. a broken steel watcher has a "return to if malfunctioning" engraved wiithin the metal part

AD_SteelWatcherTorso.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_NeurocitorGlobe.synopsis: NOTE: This AD triggers from TWO plaques in the Control Centre. The second one is TOOL_GEN_Plaque_Standing_Bronze_B_010 a068b7b5-ef5c-4e00-b891-214fe28b5765

AD_SteelWatcherHelm.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_SteelWatcherArmUnit.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_WatcherTargetingModule.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_CompleteSteelWatcher.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_FacilityTourPreparations.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_FoundryWarning2.synopsis: Warning Plaque at Other Entry Gate

AD_BrainJar4.synopsis: Brain connected to a Watcher on sentry duty

AD_PartialSteelWatcher.synopsis: This is a clickable poster on  an easel in a set of displays

AD_BrainJar5.synopsis: Brain connected to an offline Watcher so it's dreaming

AD_BrainJar6.synopsis: Brain connected to a Watcher in the Control Centre

AD_GondianDiagrams.synopsis: Diagrams of mechanical designs on an easel in the Security Office

AD_SteelWatcherSword_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SteelWatcherSword_0.text: *Hallmark of the Steel Watch, these immense Watcher Swords are forged in the Upper City at the Hall of Wonders.*

AD_PortraitOfGortash_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_PortraitOfGortash_0.text: *Lord Gortash, handsome and imperial, looks down on the people of Baldur's Gate.*

AD_SteelWatcherLegUnit_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SteelWatcherLegUnit_0.text: *The Steel Watcher's powerful spring-loaded leg components enable it to leap with surprising agility.*

AD_BrokenWatcherReturnTo_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BrokenWatcherReturnTo_0.text: *A broken Steel Watcher. A tag wired to it reads, 'Unit defective - return to the Steel Watch Foundry at the West Docks.'*

AD_SteelWatcherTorso_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SteelWatcherTorso_0.text: *The torso, the largest and most complex component, is constructed and loaded with secret components on the Lab Level below.*

AD_NeurocitorGlobe_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_NeurocitorGlobe_0.text: *Telepathic traffic radiates in waves from this semi-illithid globe, and your tadpole throbs in blissful response. This vile globe fills you with instinctive revulsion.*

AD_SteelWatcherHelm_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SteelWatcherHelm_0.text: *This majestic morion helm shields the Watcher's gyronetic and targeting modules.*

AD_SteelWatcherArmUnit_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_SteelWatcherArmUnit_0.text: *The arm component wields the mighty Watcher Sword, but is also fitted with a foldout Harpoon Bow for ranged combat.*

AD_WatcherTargetingModule_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_WatcherTargetingModule_0.text: *The Targeting Module, an optical focus device, is fitted within the Watcher's Helm to enable aiming of the Harpoon Bow.*

AD_CompleteSteelWatcher_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_CompleteSteelWatcher_0.text: *Here, in unpowered prototype form, stands a completed Steel Watcher, the proudest achievement of the Foundry, and a tribute to the untiring efforts of the Banite overseers!*

AD_FacilityTourPreparations_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FacilityTourPreparations_0.text: *For Lord Gortash's inspection, a panoply of eight displays that show how Foundry production is meeting or exceeding all quotas!*

AD_FoundryWarning2_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FoundryWarning2_0.text: *Security Zone - trespassers will be terminated without warning.*

AD_BrainJar4_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BrainJar4_0.text: *The brain in this jar is controlling a Watcher on sentry duty at Wyrm's Rock. It patrols back and forth, vigilant for trouble.*

AD_PartialSteelWatcher_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_PartialSteelWatcher_0.text: *This Watcher is in Phase Eight Assembly stage, components over-delivered for this month's quota by 114 percent!*

AD_BrainJar5_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BrainJar5_0.text: *The Watcher this brain controls is offline for maintenance. The brain dreams, images of life in a garden cottage in spring.*

AD_BrainJar6_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_BrainJar6_0.text: *The brain in this jar is aware that its Watcher is on duty in the Control Centre, vast and throbbing with illithid telepathy, so much that it ignores your mind touch as a mere distraction.*

AD_FoundryWarning1_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_FoundryWarning1_0.text: *Steel Watch Foundry - Entry Prohibited! By order of Lord Gortash.*

AD_GondianDiagrams_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_GondianDiagrams_0.text: *It's a diagram of mechanical designs, not just written but ridged, so that blind fingers can trace out their shapes.*
